mapper.insert: insert into hf_member(nickname, name, res_no, address1, address2, phone_company, phone, sex, tranz_pwd) values(#{nickname}, #{name}, #{resNo}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phoneCompany}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{tranzPwd})
mapper.update: update hf_member set tranz_pwd = #{tranzPwd} where nickname = #{nickname}
update hf_member set phone = #{phone}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} where nickname = #{nickname}
